Euclid: The Game - Level 9

Goal: Construct a circle with radius equal to line segment AB and center C.

You unlocked a new tool: Compass ! Go to Level 10.

This is the development website of euclidthegame.org. I'm currently testing how to implement a score function. The idea is that the maximum score is 1000. If you reach more than 1000 points please leave a comment, I will rescale the score function.
